text: Desmond "Des" Bernard O'Connor (12 January 1932 - 14 November 2020) was an English television presenter and singer. He was born in Stepney, London. O'Connor presented the long running game show Countdown on Channel 4 in the United Kingdom, from January 2007 to December 2008. O'Connor died on 14 November 2020 from problems caused by a fall, aged 88. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:English autobiographers Category:British game show hosts Category:English singers Category:English television presenters Category:Singers from London Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Writers from London Category:Accidental deaths from falls
title: Des O'Connor
